Trade/Device Name(s): HomeCheck Rapid Multiple(X) Abuse Drug Screen Test Cup Device
Submitter Information: Tianjin New Bay Bioresearch Co., Ltd.
Regulation Name(s): Amphetamine, Methamphetamine, Benzoylecgonine, Benzodiazepine, Marijuana, Morphine, Phencyclidine, Methadone, Oxycodone, Tricyclic Antidepressant, and Barbiturates test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for HomeCheck Rapid Multiple Abuse Drug Screen Test Cup Device for qualitative detection of multiple drugs of abuse in human urine by immunochromatographic assay
Indications for Use Summary: Provides a qualitative analytical screening procedure for detecting single or multiple drugs of abuse in human urine, intended for OTC consumer use with recommendation for confirmatory testing by GC/MS or HPLC.
